text: @realDonaldTrump ...HEY... ‘Little Hands 👐🏻, Mushroom 🍄🍆’ ...you MORONICALLY said the few (5) cases will MIRACULOUSLY..just go away.. puff 💨 there were ..11 deaths from COVID-19 on March 5!... today May 25..we are on the verge of breaking .... 100,000 !.. 😳🤯🤯..🤨..😞😞... #RT @WhiteHouse
